data.actual_result: The cursor turns to the "pointing hyperlink hand" cursor state, despite the image not being able to be clicked directly to do any action.
data.expected_result: The cursor should stay in the arrow cursor state when hovering over the picture.
data.short_description: Wrong cursor when hovering over big image preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an image preview inside Discord - Hover the cursor over it
